current_bottleneck.description: ROOT CAUSE FOUND via Funnel-Test! CTA ist 'Go to Dashboard', Generator ist BELOW THE FOLD
current_bottleneck.impact: 8 Real Users sehen Demo, aber KEINER findet den Generator
current_bottleneck.fix: 1. Demo-Page CTA ändern 2. Dashboard Layout: Generator OBEN 3. Chrome Extension UNTEN

secondary_bottlenecks.description: Google Places, Serper, Outscraper (alle 3 Keys) - ALLE APIs exhausted!
Campaign sendet nur an US-Cities, 1656 EU-Leads werden ignoriert

findings.cta_after_unlock: FAIL - Says 'Go to Dashboard' not 'Generate Response'
findings.dashboard_layout: FAIL - Generator BELOW THE FOLD, Chrome Extension takes half screen

funnel_test_results.root_cause: User sieht Demo, denkt 'fertig', verlässt. Generator nicht sichtbar ohne Scrollen.
recommended_fixes: Demo-Page CTA: 'Generate Your Own Responses →' statt 'Go to Dashboard'
Dashboard: Generator OBEN, Chrome Extension UNTEN
Alternative: Separierte /generator Route für neue User

corrections.correction: Email system IS healthy - 49 emails in 24h, cron works
corrections.learning: campaign.last_reset != last email sent. Check parallel-safe-status for real email activity.

learnings_applied: campaign.last_reset != last email sent - always check parallel-safe-status
